hooks.prompt:
ROS1 Noetic environment detected. When running Bash-based ROS commands, source the environment first:

```bash
source /opt/ros/${ROS_DISTRO:-noetic}/setup.bash
source ${CATKIN_WS:-catkin_ws}/devel/setup.bash 2>/dev/null || true
```

Available commands:
- /ros:status - System overview
- /ros:topics - Topic inspection
- /ros:services - Service management
- /ros:params - Parameter management
- /ros:tf - Transform tree
- /ros:build - Catkin build
- /ros:launch - Launch file management
- /ros:record - Rosbag recording
- /ros:diag - Diagnostics
